casebody.data:
Second Department,

November, 1949.

(November 7, 1949.) In the Matter of John E. Martin, Jr., Individually and as Guardian ad Litem of Joan E. Martin, an Infant, Appellant, against School Board of Union Free District No. 28, Long Beach, Respondent.

Present — Carswell, Acting P. J., Johnston, Adel, Wenzel and MacCrate, JJ. [See 275 App. Div. 1042.]
